::Reptilica/Ramulus::

Reptilica laughs. "Don't melt yourself. Megs ain't gonna get anywhere. I'll 
call Zardus, though."

He activates his comm-link. "Hey, Zardus," he says into it, "There's a Pred 
that wants to meet you here."

"I'm on my way," Zardus' voice replies.

"He's coming," Reptilica says to Starscream, "Just hold on a sec."

He frowns as he recieves Dark One's request for backup, checking his scanners 
to see what Alliance units were available.

"Burning Hammer, Stranato, Inzola, and Treadshot, can you guys go to 
DarkOne's location? He needs backup." he says into his comm, sending it to 
them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus follows Brix and Fliq into the shuttle, sitting down and strapping 
himself in. His face turns a bit white as he remembers how the landing had 
been.

"Let's hope it holds," he says in a nervious voice, gulping.
